data.communities: cvs repo, email with the developer, developer's website website.
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Term::Shelly is good. You love it. Go ahead, touch it... touch it!
    you want to... it commands you to touch it. Zorro would, why won't
    you? Come on! You can do anything at zombo.. er.. Term::Shelly...

    Term::Shelly is a.. Shell.. kit.. thing. Thus it's module name is
    appropriate. it is not a Term::ReadLine derivative and thus isn't
    named such.
